name: ConfigManager
description: The ConfigManager class is a central component in JsMacros responsible for managing all configuration data, including core settings, profiles, and various option classes.
overview: The ConfigManager provides comprehensive configuration management functionality: Manages configuration files in JSON format with pretty printing; Handles automatic configuration format conversion between versions; Provides structured access to different configuration option classes; Automatically creates and manages config and macro directories; Supports adding custom option classes dynamically; Handles configuration backup and recovery on errors; Manages profile-based script configurations.

methods.name: getOptions
methods.description: Retrieves the options object for a specific option class.

parameters.name: optionClass
parameters.description: The class of the options to retrieve

methods.name: addOptions
methods.description: Adds a new option class to the configuration manager.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The unique key to identify this option class

parameters.name: optionClass
parameters.description: The class that handles this configuration section

methods.name: loadConfig
methods.description: Loads all configuration data from files, including format conversion if needed.

methods.name: saveConfig
methods.description: Saves all current configuration data to the configuration file.

methods.name: reloadRawConfigFromFile
methods.description: Reloads the raw JSON configuration from the file without processing.

methods.name: convertConfigFormat
methods.description: Converts configuration format from an older version to the current version.

methods.name: convertConfigFormat
methods.description: Converts configuration format for a specific class.

parameters.name: clazz
parameters.description: The class whose configuration needs conversion

methods.name: loadDefaults
methods.description: Loads default configuration values for all registered option classes.
